topics.body: I have a dumb question: why is it in so many franchises in practically everything they make the main character invulnerable for the sake of a lower tv rating?  You shouldn't be able to shrug off getting hit by a truc. . okay I'm a physical walking bad example of this in that I've gotten hit by vehicles and walked it off, but you get the point.  Even if you don't get seriously injured from shit like that it still fucking hurts a lot.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
